EmailTemplate.description: Email to customer that their order refund has been processed for Off 5th English
EmailTemplate.name: Case - ORC Closed (O5 English)
EmailTemplate.subject: We’ve issued your refund
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for contacting {!Case.Business_Unit__c}. We’ve issued your refund and it will reflect in your account within 14 days. If you have any questions or concerns, please don’t hesitate to contact us again and refer to case {!Case.CaseNumber}.
CONTACT US
Sincerely, {!Case.Business_Unit__c} Customer Service
{!Case.Thread_Id}
